summary.para: Contains classes that the Heatmap Control for WinForms and Heatmap Control for WPF require to function.
Contains heatmap cell arguments and value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Charts.Heatmap.HeatmapCell.ColorValue

summary.para: Returns a cell color or value that is used to determine a color.

member.value: An object that is used to apply a color to the cell.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Charts.Heatmap.HeatmapCell.Tag

summary.para: Returns additional information that is related to the heatmap cell.

member.value: An object that contains data about the heatmap cell.

summary.para: Returns a heatmap cell argument for an x-axis.
Returns a heatmap cell argument for a y-axis.
Contains members used to plot Sankey diagrams.
For internal use.
Returns the link’s source node.
Returns the link’s target node.
Returns the weight of the link.
Is used in the SankeyLayoutAlgorithmBase.CalculateNodeBounds method.
Specifies node bounds.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Charts.Sankey.ISankeyNodeLayoutItem.InputLinks

summary.para: Returns a collection of Sankey node input links.

member.value: A collection that contains links for which the node is the target node.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Charts.Sankey.ISankeyNodeLayoutItem.LevelIndex

summary.para: Returns a value that specifies the node level.

member.value: A zero-based value that specifies the node level.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Charts.Sankey.ISankeyNodeLayoutItem.OutputLinks

summary.para: Returns a collection of Sankey node output links.

member.value: A collection that contains links for which the node is the source node.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Charts.Sankey.ISankeyNodeLayoutItem.SourceWeight

summary.para: Returns the summarized weight of all links for which the current node is the source.

member.value: The summarized weight of all links for which the current node is the source.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Charts.Sankey.ISankeyNodeLayoutItem.Tag

summary.para: Returns a data source object that is used to create the node.

member.value: A data source object that is used to create the node.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Charts.Sankey.ISankeyNodeLayoutItem.TargetWeight

summary.para: Returns the summarized weight of all links for which the current node is the target.

member.value: The summarized weight of all links for which the current node is the target.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Charts.Sankey.ISankeyNodeLayoutItem.TotalWeight

summary.para: Returns the maximum value between the source and target weights of the node.

member.value: The maximum value between the source and target weights of the node.
